scripts.build:chrome: VITE_BROWSER=chrome vite build && VITE_BROWSER=chrome APP_FILE=popup vite build && VITE_BROWSER=chrome APP_FILE=options vite build
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build:chrome && web-ext run --source-dir ./dist/chrome --target=chromium --start-url https://globalprivacycontrol.org --start-url https://global-privacy-control.glitch.me
